paragraphs.name: f5a9
paragraphs.text: This was not the only success of the mission. An image of the scientists celebrating in the mission control room went viral. Girls in India and beyond gained new heroes: the kind that wear sarees and tie flowers in their hair, and send rockets into space.
Worldwide, half of all brains are in women.
paragraphs.name: 820e

6af7bd8ff5d5.title: What I really like about this is the fact that they are plain ole your next door women who have…

paragraphs.text: What I really like about this is the fact that they are plain ole your next door women who have achieved so much. They are not super models which is the necessary requirement in Western cultures-the more glamorous/super model a woman in the West-the more she is paid attention and the corporate culture is more focused on how a woman should dress up than on her abilities.
paragraphs.name: b0ba

4428309c99d4.title: Meanwhile in the USA, women march on the streets for the right to abort their babies on demand, and…

paragraphs.text: Meanwhile in the USA, women march on the streets for the right to abort their babies on demand, and to earn movie star salaries similar to their male Hollywood colleagues, all in the name of “equality” and “feminism”.
paragraphs.name: 17dc

paragraphs.text: THIS story, dear reader, defines the true definitions of equality and feminism. Congratulations ladies, I am humbled by you all.
paragraphs.name: b686

virtuals.subtitle: THIS story, dear reader, defines the true definitions of equality and feminism. Congratulations ladies, I am humbled by you all.

content.subtitle: THIS story, dear reader, defines the true definitions of equality and feminism. Congratulations ladies, I am humbled by you all.

a365a62c843b.title: Even greater feat was the recent launch which placed 104 satellites in orbit.

paragraphs.text: Even greater feat was the recent launch which placed 104 satellites in orbit. Nobody mentioned it overtook Spacex (Elon Musk's) feat of 72 satellites.
paragraphs.name: 8dde

2de66f2ec86c.title: This is one of the few articles that has really thrilled me, like I was at the space control room…

paragraphs.text: This is one of the few articles that has really thrilled me, like I was at the space control room that day.
paragraphs.name: e623

paragraphs.text: Ipsita thanks for sharing this. This sentence says it all. If those brains are not permitted for the advancement of humankind what a waste!!
paragraphs.name: 3bf0

paragraphs.text: Culture is just a set of beliefs. ( that is the way it is done in our society etc.) Time to break the barriers and reach for the sky like these women.

paragraphs.text: What an amazing story. Go Indian women! You showed the world what you can do… Mission Impossible in so may ways — ACCOMPLISHED!!! What a role model for all young girls and boys everywhere :-)

65dbf2367489.title: Very very proud. Well done is quite feeble.

98a3dbd47faa.title: see, this has to happen someday in the history of indian science.

paragraphs.text: see, this has to happen someday in the history of indian science. our culture back in the ages of 1700,1800&1900, never allowed our female group to experience or get exposed to real life reality. i don’t question their ideologies rather presume that only that was the only reason that we still lack in the area of everything in our society and life. we…
paragraphs.name: 55fb

5df6319e9923.title: If this is not inspirational, don’t know what else is.

paragraphs.text: If this is not inspirational, don’t know what else is.
paragraphs.name: d29c

b67e6ffd98e3.title: This is such an amazing story.

paragraphs.text: This is such an amazing story. As a species we need to reach for the stars and denying or limiting any members of our species from contributing towards that goal just limits the species as a whole.
paragraphs.name: 15f4

beff1650ea02.title: Wonderful retelling of such a fantastic story!

paragraphs.text: Wonderful retelling of such a fantastic story! And I think these magnificent women show not only little girls that they can wear sarees and be scientists and fly rockets to mars – they show boys (& men) that women can do this too, and that they should *expect* to work with and for women.

b0807835fdd7.title: India is changing and despite of all the past problems due to colonial and Islamic rulings she has…

paragraphs.text: India is changing and despite of all the past problems due to colonial and Islamic rulings she has made remarkable progress. Historically women in India were respected. It has the only living tradition in the world where woman is worshiped as Goddesses. There is lots of philosophy (and science) behind this. Nature has given her more responsibility than man.
paragraphs.name: 351a

1f3db54fe0a.title: Our future is feminine. So proud and happy for your article !!! All URIJI supports this. Uriji Jami

paragraphs.text: Our future is feminine. So proud and happy for your article !!! All URIJI supports this. Uriji Jami
Hidden Figures Vol. 2

a174d1ea3de5.title: I hope my daughters or their daughters live in a world where this doesn’t have to matter: where…

paragraphs.text: I hope my daughters or their daughters live in a world where this doesn’t have to matter: where opportunities for each gender is as equal as the sunshine on us all each day.
But it’s not yet.
paragraphs.name: 608c

paragraphs.text: So this must be shared and this wonderful story must be known.

paragraphs.text: That will be a beautiful day.

dd51d2ae557a.title: The western world has created a very boring image of what a successful scientist looks like.

paragraphs.text: The western world has created a very boring image of what a successful scientist looks like. Big successes like this show that image is completely out of date.

44e4b5ffca2c.title: So great to see this story.

paragraphs.text: So great to see this story. This is such a wonderful example of what women can do given the same chance as men. Please post this in more places and continue to publish stories such as this. Many thanks.
